content: I'm glad you provided that information. Speaking of settling into a new life, I'm still getting used to the idea of starting over in a new country. It's been two years since I fled my home due to persecution and violence, and it feels like my life has been on hold. I'm grateful for the support of the UNHCR and the Canadian government, but it's been a long and challenging journey. I waited over a year for the approval of my asylum application, and now I'm finally getting a chance to rebuild my life.
